name: Positive Pulse, Greater
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Planar Adventures © 2018, Paizo Inc.
text: This spell functions like positive pulse, except that the damage dealt increases to 3d6 plus your caster level, and the bonus on saving throws increases to +8.
text_zh: 这种法术类似于正能量脉冲（Positive Pulse），不过造成的伤害提升为3d6点+施法者等级，豁免检定的加值提升为+8。
